com.exlibris.dps.sdk.risks

Interface RiskExtractor


  • public interface RiskExtractor
    Interface for risk extractors
    This plugin interface only supports java implementation.

    The risk analysis framework calls the init() function once for each registered RiskExtractor. The isAtRisk functions should be thread-safe. Currently the RiskExtractorResult class holds only atRisk boolean attributes.

    Author:
    tsachm

      • isAtRisk

        boolean isAtRisk(DnxDocument dnxDocument,
               java.lang.String pathToFile)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Check if a given file is at risk.
        Parameters:
        dnxDocument - The DNX document of the file that should be checked.
        pathToFile - - The absolute path to the file that needs to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the risk exists, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
